John Doe is the Executive Director of the Computational Life Sciences Foundation. With over 15 years of experience in computational biology, John leads the foundation's strategic initiatives and partnerships.

His research focuses on machine learning applications in genomics and he has published extensively in top-tier journals on the subject.
